tool.name: Disambiguate ambiguous sequences
tool.description: produces random, unambiguous variants of ambiguous sequences
tool.help:
**What it does**
Sometimes fasta files have ambiguous bases in them. Many downstream tools dislike, or outright don't tolerate ambiguous bases. Thus, those have to be removed. The easiest way to do that is to randomly replace them.
::
>test ACTGURYMKWSBDHVN
Running this tool will correct the above sequence to:
::
>test ACTGTATCTTCCATAT
and also produce a table of the changes:
::
# Pos Orig New 4 U T 5 R A 6 Y T 7 M C 8 K T 9 W T 10 S C 11 B C 12 D A 13 H T 14 V A 15 N T
